title: Here's how much Apple CEO Tim Cook made last year
full_text: Here's how much Apple CEO Tim Cook made last year. Tim Cook's salary was a drop in the bucket of the Apple CEO's total pay package for 2025.. Tim Cook made slightly less in 2025 than he did in 2024.Tom Williams/CQ-Roll Call, Inc via Getty Images <ul><li>Apple CEO Tim Cook earned $74.3 million in total compensation for fiscal year 2025.</l… [+1508 chars]
